Uses of Interface
model.IModel

  • Packages that use IModel 
    Package Description
    controller
    The controller package for the GizmoBall Application This package contains the controller for the application.
    model
    The model package for the Gizmoball application The model holds the current state of the game and is responsible for updating its state during play
    tests
    The tests package for the GizmoBall Application This package contains the tests for the gizmoball application.
    view
    The view package for the GizmoBall Application This package contains the view portion of the application
